interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Alibd 8A Brazilian Virgin Hair Body Wave 3 Bundles 100% Unprocessed Human Hair Extension Wavy Style for Women, Natural Black(16 18 20 Inch)
Review Date: 2017/11/10
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'weave', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.31 x 10.31 x 2.05 inches; 10.56 Ounces'}
Review Text: For a second I was skeptical because 3 bundles 16,18,20 for only $52 cant be real hair but you know what this is some good hair. Out the package the hair was a bit dry but i washed it and then deep conditioned and the hair had a nice wave to it and was soooooo soft, no shedding, few small hairs and true to length. I colored the ends using Loreal Hicolor in the color natural blonde and the hair colored amazing. Did not damage the hair and the color is so vibrant and amazing. The only reason im giving this 4 stars is because the ends of the hair were thinner than any hair i've ever receieved. But the hair is absolutely gorg. Ive had this hair for almost 2 months and still is as soft and great as when I purchased it. This hair never tangles and I only get 1-2 strands of shedding per day if that.
Review Title: Soooooo Soft.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Helene Hair Brazilian Virgin Hair Human Hair Body Wave Top Lace Closure (4"4") Part 8-20 Inch Naturl Black Bleached Knots (18 Inch)
Helene Hair
{'Brand': 'Helene Hair', 'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.5 x 5.4 x 1.5 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '889583690927'}
These closures never disappoint. I usually get the 10 or 12 inch closures but this time I got the 18 inch closure and its still beautiful. The hair is soft and luscious as always and the ends are healthy and full. I used these closure every time I make a wig I DO NOT WEAR SEW-INS only wigs. I have purchased over 15 of these closures, I love them and will continue to buy.
Great closure and great hair as ALWAYS!!
Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals
Pure Body Naturals
{'Brand': 'Pure Body Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437736398 646437319751'}
This is some great shampoo. I have tried several argan oil shampoos and this is by far the best. Great smell and leaves the hair soft before conditioning. Usually with shampoo, the hair feels dry but not with this. I even used this one time without conditioning afterwards and my hair was still soft and smelled really good.
I have tried several Argan oil shampoos and this is by far the best.
Sunwell Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Closure 3.5x4 Kinky Curly Human Hair Lace Closure with Baby Hair Bleached Knots Natural Color Free Part 10
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6.5 x 0.3 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '732840237895'}
Ordered 3 curly bundles from another vendor and needed a closure. This closure blended great. I bleached the knots of the closure. Soft and great hair. This texture of hair requires heavy maintenance but it's amazing hair for the price.
Love this texture.
ATOZWIG 7A Malaysian Virgin Hair Straight Lace Frontal Closure 13"x4" Lace Frontal Closure Soft Malaysian Straight Closure 16 inch
{'Package Dimensions': '9.5 x 7.5 x 0.5 inches; 1.6 Ounces'}
Great Frontal. Soft Silky and Full!!
Great Frontal.
Alibd 8A Brazilian Virgin Hair Body Wave 3 Bundles 100% Unprocessed Human Hair Extension Wavy Style for Women, Natural Black(16 18 20 Inch)
{'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'weave', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.31 x 10.31 x 2.05 inches; 10.56 Ounces'}
For a second I was skeptical because 3 bundles 16,18,20 for only $52 cant be real hair but you know what this is some good hair. Out the package the hair was a bit dry but i washed it and then deep conditioned and the hair had a nice wave to it and was soooooo soft, no shedding, few small hairs and true to length. I colored the ends using Loreal Hicolor in the color natural blonde and the hair colored amazing. Did not damage the hair and the color is so vibrant and amazing. The only reason im giving this 4 stars is because the ends of the hair were thinner than any hair i've ever receieved. But the hair is absolutely gorg. Ive had this hair for almost 2 months and still is as soft and great as when I purchased it. This hair never tangles and I only get 1-2 strands of shedding per day if that.
Soooooo Soft.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Products:** The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality human hair closures, particularly in body wave and curly styles, while engaging exclusively in wig-making. Her recent purchase of wavy bundles reflects her interest in versatile textures, although she continues to explore different styles, indicated by her past acquisition of a straight lace frontal closure.

- **Brand Loyalty:** The user demonstrates loyalty to trusted brands and consistently favors high-quality products. Her satisfaction with recent purchases indicates a preference for reputable brands and a critical approach to product selection.

- **Product Length Preference:** She generally favors shorter hair lengths (10-12 inches) but is open to longer options (up to 20 inches) for versatility, continuing to prioritize healthy, full ends.

- **Quality Expectations:** The user expects softness, natural appearance, and effective performance from her hair care products. She highly values healthy ends and has praised products for their soft, silky textures in her reviews.

- **Reviewing Behavior:** The user actively leaves enthusiastic reviews, often highlighting specific performance features. Her recent review reflects both appreciation for softness and an acknowledgment of minor imperfections, showcasing her thorough approach to product evaluation.

- **Overall Trend:** The user's preferences underscore a commitment to quality and effective performance in hair care. She shows a notable interest in versatile textures that complement her wig-making experience, balancing aesthetics with practical performance.
